name: Detective Office Demo
description:
This is a showcase of a 2 weeks project, for everyone who wants to try this prototype.

Made by 2 people: 

Alexis Banak - 3D Artist/Lighting : https://www.artstation.com/alexis_banak

Steven Della-rica - GD/Prog : https://dellaricasteven.wixsite.com/gamedesign

To play the game, simply download it and extract it where you want, go into Windows file and click on the executable.
